items.title: UK Trade Tariff: duty suspensions and autonomous tariff quotas
items.summary: Temporary duty suspensions and autonomous tariff quotas (ATQs) for importing goods into the UK.

items.title: Clean energy upgrades for hospitals and military sites
items.summary: £74 million for clean energy upgrades to cut bills for public buildings and create savings for frontline services.

items.title: Make Work Pay: fire and rehire – changes to expenses, benefits, and shift patterns
items.summary: We're seeking views on 2 proposed changes to fire and rehire protections in relation to benefits and expenses, and to shift patterns.

items.title: Policy paper: Implementing the Plan to Make Work Pay and Employment Rights Act
items.summary: The updated implementation timeline for the government’s Plan to Make Work Pay and the Employment Rights Act 2025.

items.title: Transparency data: COVID-19 loan guarantee schemes repayment data: September 2025
items.summary: The latest quarterly update of data on the performance of the government’s COVID-19 loan guarantee schemes. Data as at September 2025

items.title: Notice: Apply for the Heat Network Efficiency Scheme (HNES): Round 11
items.summary: The Heat Network Efficiency Scheme supports performance improvements to existing district heating or communal heating projects.

items.title: Clean energy funding to be tied to stronger workers’ rights
items.summary: Offshore wind firms must sign up to a ‘Fair Work Charter’ to participate in government renewables auctions.

items.title: Notice: Heat Pump Ready Programme
items.summary: The programme supports the development and demonstration of heat pump technologies and tools, and solutions for optimised deployment of heat pumps.

items.title: Make Work Pay: recognition code of practice and e-balloting unfair practices
items.summary: We are seeking views on the revised code of practice during recognition and derecognition processes and on proposals on unfair practices in electronic ballots.

items.title: UK and Europe sign historic pact to drive clean energy future
items.summary: Energy Secretary Ed Miliband signs a historic clean energy security pact.

items.title: Notice: Building the North Seas’ power hub for a resilient and competitive Europe: North Sea Summit declarations 2026
items.summary: Declarations between the UK and North Seas countries at the 3rd North Sea Summit, Hamburg, Germany, January 2026.

items.title: Policy paper: Civil nuclear fuel use: statement
items.summary: Statement outlining the UK Government’s guiding principles for civil nuclear fuel use to support energy security, new reactor deployment, and long‑term planning.

items.title: Guidance: Advanced nuclear pipeline: how to apply
items.summary: How to apply to the United Kingdom Advanced Nuclear Pipeline for advanced nuclear projects.

items.title: Policy paper: Advanced Nuclear Technologies
items.summary: Information about Advanced Nuclear Technologies, previously known as Small Modular Reactors.

items.title: Policy paper: Advanced nuclear framework
items.summary: This Framework is designed to support the development, commercialisation and deployment of private innovative nuclear projects within the UK energy system.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Building materials and components statistics: January 2026
items.summary: Statistics and analysis on the construction sector for January 2026.

items.title: Contracts for Difference: reforms to the Clean Industry Bonus, Allocation Round 8
items.summary: We’re seeking views on regulatory reforms to the Clean Industry Bonus ahead of Allocation Round 8 of the Contracts for Difference scheme.

items.title: Government to unlock advanced nuclear to grow economy
items.summary: Government publishes Advanced Nuclear Framework to get pioneering nuclear technology off the ground.

items.title: Transparency data: Women on boards: executive search firms signed up to the code of conduct
items.summary: A list of executive search firms signed up to the voluntary code of conduct to address gender diversity on corporate boards.

items.title: Oil and gas: offshore environmental legislation
items.summary: Environmental regulations and guidance on offshore oil and gas exploration and production offshore gas unloading and storage and offshore carbon dioxide storage activities

items.title: Guidance: Warm Homes: Local Grant – guidance for local authorities
items.summary: Funding for local authorities to deliver energy performance and low carbon heating upgrades to low-income homes in England.

items.title: Research: Fossil fuel price assumptions: 2025
items.summary: These fossil fuel price assumptions present various assumptions for the wholesale prices of oil, gas and coal for the UK out to 2050.

items.title: Research: Traded carbon values used for modelling purposes, 2025
items.summary: This publication provides the Department for Energy Security and Net Zero’s (DESNZ) traded carbon values for modelling purposes.

items.title: Research: Energy and emissions projections: 2024 to 2050
items.summary: Projections of energy demand, greenhouse gas emissions and electricity generation from 2024 to 2050.

items.title: Guidance: Core Regulatory Skills Framework
items.summary: This framework supports UK regulatory organisations and officials to improve regulatory practice.

items.title: Regulations: noise emissions from outdoor equipment
items.summary: Guidance for manufacturers, authorised representatives, and responsible persons.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Weekly road fuel prices
items.summary: Road fuel price statistics providing average UK retail 'pump' prices on a weekly basis.

items.title: Policy paper: Green Home Finance Strategic Partnership: terms of reference
items.summary: A partnership bringing together government, industry and other relevant experts to develop recommendations for scaling up the private Green Home Finance market.

items.title: Enhanced Free Trade Agreement with Switzerland round update
items.summary: Update following round 9 of negotiations on an enhanced Free Trade Agreement with Switzerland.

items.title: UK lenders step up with £11 billion push to back British businesses
items.summary: UK banks agree £11 billion lending packages to support small business growth, particularly for small and mid-sized enterprises.

items.title: Low Carbon Contracts Company and Electricity Settlements Company operational costs: 2026/27, 2027/28 and 2028/29
items.summary: We're seeking views on the operational cost levies for the Low Carbon Contracts Company and the Electricity Settlements Company 2026/27, 2027/28 and 2028/29.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets (partner names beginning with C to F)
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with individual trading and investment partners overseas, for partners whose name begins with C, D, E or F.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets (partner names beginning with W to Z)
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with individual trading and investment partners overseas, for partners whose name begins with W, X, Y or Z.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets (partner names beginning with G to I)
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with individual trading and investment partners overseas, for partners whose name begins with G, H or I.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets (partner names beginning with S)
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with individual trading and investment partners overseas, for partners whose name begins with S.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets (partner names beginning with J to L)
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with individual trading and investment partners overseas, for partners whose name begins with J, K or L.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets (partner names beginning with T to V)
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with individual trading and investment partners overseas, for partners whose name begins with T, U or V.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets (partner names beginning with A or B)
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with individual trading and investment partners overseas, for partners whose name begins with A or B.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets (partner names beginning with P to R)
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with individual trading and investment partners overseas, for partners whose name begins with P, Q or R.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets (partner names beginning with M to O)
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with individual trading and investment partners overseas, for partners whose name begins with M, N or O.
